name: server

scripts.build: tsc && if not exist dist\database mkdir dist\database & xcopy /Y /I database\*.sql dist\database\ & xcopy /Y /I database\*.js dist\database\ & if exist dist\database\*.db del /Q dist\database\*.db & if not exist dist\controllers mkdir dist\controllers & xcopy /Y /E /I controllers dist\controllers & xcopy /Y /I controllers\cashbox.controller.js dist\controllers\cashbox.controller.js & if not exist dist\routes mkdir dist\routes & xcopy /Y /E /I routes dist\routes & if not exist dist\middlewares mkdir dist\middlewares & xcopy /Y /E /I middlewares dist\middlewares & if not exist dist\utils mkdir dist\utils & xcopy /Y /E /I utils dist\utils & xcopy /Y /I utils\backup.js dist\utils\backup.js & xcopy /Y /I database\db.js dist\database\db.js & xcopy /Y /I database\stockDb.js dist\database\stockDb.js & if not exist dist\config\fonts mkdir dist\config\fonts & xcopy /Y /E /I config\fonts dist\config\fonts & xcopy /Y backup.config.json dist\backup.config.json

description: Backend API for Inventory Management System
